      • createParts

        public static java.util.Vector<ArenaPart> createParts(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.Vector<java.awt.Shape>> shapesWithTypeMap,
                                      int layer,
                                      Arena arena)
        Takes a map of shapes indexed by their type and creates Vector of ArenaParts.
        Parameters:
        shapesWithTypeMap - a map of shapes the ArenaParts are to be made of.
        layer - Specifies which layer the ArenaParts that we've created are on.
        arena - An Arena Reference is required for Robot's constructor.
        Returns:
        Vector of ArenaParts

      • createPart

        public static ArenaPart createPart(java.awt.Shape shape,
                   java.lang.String type,
                   int layer,
                   Arena arena)
        Tries to create a child class of ArenaPart of exact name given as the second parameter.
        Parameters:
        shape - Determines the shape.
        type - Specifies the type of the future ArenaPart.
        layer - Number of the layer in the arena if it is a surface.
        arena - An Arena reference is required for Robot's constructor.
        Returns:
        A new ArenaPart child class.

        Takes a shape and returns an array of the points it is made of.
        Parameters:
        shape - Input shape
        Returns:
        Array of Point2D coordinates of the traversal points.
